page.title: 11Steeple Aston
page.content: Old stone cottages predominate with private and council modern housing in the village of Steeple Aston. There are also some old people's bungalows. Most people travel outside the area for work. Others are self employed and include authors, a carpenter, electrician, gardener, hairdresser. There is no railway in the area but Steeple Aston residents use nearby Heyford Station for travelling to work in Oxford, Banbury or London. (There are direct trains to Paddington.) Limited local bus services are available. Gas has recently been brought to the area and serves some homes. Electricity is generally available.
